Class Zombie

java.lang.Object
model.HorrorCharacter
model.Zombie
public class Zombie extends HorrorCharacter
Class representing a Zombie character in the horror RPG game. Zombies are vulnerable to fire and sunlight.

      public void attack()
      Attack method for the zombie. Zombies attack by eating the brains of their victims.

      public void flee()
      Flee method for the zombie. Zombies are unable to flee.
